briefdescription.para: Assigned the cooefficients for the compact schemes Scope: mpi called-freq xdomain module all once specified private.

memberdef.argsstring: (n, is_periodic, coeff, a, b, c, d)
memberdef.name: buildup_tdma_lhs_array

briefdescription.para: Assigning the sparse matrix in the LHS of the compact scheme, and calculating the geometry-only dependent variables for the TDMA scheme.

detaileddescription.para:
This subroutine is called once locally.
n
the number of unknown array
bc
the boundary condition at two ends of the unknown
coeff
the basic TDMA coefficients defined above.
a
the coefficients for TDMA
b
a_i * x_(i-1) + b_i * x_(i) + c_i * x_(i+1)
c
= RHS
d
An assisting coeffients for the TDMA scheme.
Scope: mpi called-freq xdomain all once all

briefdescription.para: Preparing the RHS array for the TDMA algorithm for interpolation. This subroutine is called repeatly to update the RHS of the TDMA algorithm for the interpolation.

detaileddescription.para:
Scope: mpi called-freq xdomain module given pencil needed specified private index arrangment j'-1 j'-1 j' j'+1 j'+2 _|__.__|__.__|__.__|__.__|__.__ j-2 j-1 j j+1 j+2
n
the number of unknowns, here is nc
ibc
the b.c. type at two ends of the unknown array
fbc
the b.c. values for the given ibc
inbr
the neibouring index of 4 bc nodes
coeff
the defined TDMA coefficients
fi
the input variable to build up the RHS array
fo
the output RHS array

memberdef.argsstring: (fi, fo, nc, coeff, dd, ibc, fbc)
memberdef.name: prepare_tdma_1deri_c2c_rhs_array

detaileddescription.para:
Scope: mpi called-freq xdomain module in-given pencil needed specified private Y: index arrangment j'-1 j'-1 j' j'+1 j'+2 _|__.__|__.__|__.__|__.__|__.__ j-2 j-1 j j+1 j+2

coeff

ixsub
x-subdomain index
ibc
bc type
fbc
bc value
inbr
the neibouring index of 4 bc nodes
fi
the input array of original variable
fo
the output array of interpolated variable
